Articles.Content: The Original hemets are fine, but maybe the Kerbals need more choices...
Oh man, this is awesome! They remind me of Halo helmets, especially Bert and the helmet to the left I like Melvin most

I feel like KSP should have upgradable spacesuits or at least different variants for different situations.

It doesn't make a whole lot of sense to be using the same spacesuit design that we used for our very first Mun landing while we're out exploring Laythe in campaign endgame.

I wish these were in the game. Custom kerbals would be great.

...it would also make killing them that much worse.
If you could do that you could mod them to be truly horrific and ugly. You know.... Humans

Oh wow! That looks awesome. The first two (Going from left to right) look like standard protocol for EVA in orbit, the third is for Atmospheric planet EVA, the fourth is for lunar EVA, the fifth is for mining operations, and the last is military/stunts.

Congatulations, you just got Rareden approved!

Just for fun muahahaha
i want to model them if i can get permission

i want to model them if i can get permission

Yes you can, want to see how they turn out!
I like Melvin and Jeb. It would be great if I could have theoretical Kerbal Space Marines do theoretical space missions to the theoretical Mun base. But of course, that's all in theory.
If you can find a way to change the helmet models I will help!

If you can find a way to change the helmet models I will help!

dont think its possible, me and tingle tried to replace them when he was making universe replacer and he couldn't figure it out
Maybe have them as a part to be put on Kerbals, and with texture replacer we can set them to not have the normal helmets on. If this goes somewhere I'll try to write a plugin.

Hey guys, thanks for looking at my artwork! Love the feedback!

So is there anything you can do to make it into the game? Ã­Â Â½Ã­Â¸Æ’
